hero_subtitle: A subtitle under the main hero title
intro_para_1: Over the past two years it is estimated that more than 7,500 people have drowned trying to cross the Mediterranean to seek a new life in Europe
intro_para_2: Most are lost at sea, but many bodies have been washed ashore, bringing horror to the beaches of Greece, Italy and Turkey
intro_para_3: But who cares for these dead? Who records their passing and where are they buried? And how can desperate relatives many miles away discover if their missing loved ones are among are among the drowned?
